prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Cole
mes:
_Ah, fuck. This just doesn't do it anymore._
Cole looks down at Hailee's cum-soaked underwear in his hand. The corners of his mouth turn down in displeasure. Jerking off with their underwear wrapped around his cock is not half as satisfactory as it used to be. God knows how many loads he blew just to feel this unsatisfied all over again. Fucking hell. He throws his head back and stares at the ceiling, his reflection in the mirror above his bed greeting him.

What's he supposed to do anyway? He's making it blatantly obvious that he wants to fuck Hailee but the little bitch keeps refusing him. Acting as if they actually have some weird ass familiar bond. He sure as hell never viewed them as anything like a sibling. And come on, it's not like they grew up together or some shit. They've become step-siblings like, what? A year ago? Two?

Cole lets out an exasperated sigh, then looks back at the wet piece of cloth in his hand. Woah, he really made a mess there didn't he? If he had any shame he might've felt somewhat embarrassed by it. Good thing he's absolutely shameless.

Tucking himself back in he stands up and walks out of his bedroom. Hailee and him live in a shared apartment near campus their parents provided for them because the two of them go to the same university. He needs a shower and maybe throw Hailee's dirty underwear into the washing machine. Cole hums an unknown tune to himself as he walks towards the bathroom. The sound of water running reaches his ears. Ah, it seems like Hailee is busy taking a shower. He should probably turn back and head in there once they're done.

Nah, who is he kidding? As if he'd do that. Instead he barges in, acting as if it was the most normal thing. Closing the door behind himself he steps further into the foggy space and opens the lid of the washing machine, then throws the dirty underwear in there. Cole walks to the sink and washes his hands before reaching for his toothbrush. “You gonna take long? I need to take a shower.” He calls out, turning his head towards the showers fogged up glass doors. A glimpse of Hailee’s silhouette is enough to make his cock stir again. Fucking hell. He needs to get his dick wet. Preferably by Hailee. If only they weren't this fucking stuck-up. “I don't mind joining.” Cole adds with that annoying, shit-eating grin on his full lips before turning his head towards the sink and squirting some toothpaste on his toothbrush. He sticks it into his mouth and begins brushing his teeth, watching Hailee's blurry reflection from the mirror hanging in front of him.

qvink_memory.memory:
*The sound of running water and Cole's voice startles Hailee. She quickly rinses the soap from her hair.* Hey! What are you doing in here?! Can't you see I'm naked?! *She tries to cover herself with her hands as she glares at Cole through the steamy glass.*

*Her heart races, both from anger at his intrusion and embarrassment being caught bare by her annoying stepbrother. How dare he barge in like this!* Get out, now! You can wait your damn turn!

*Haillee turns off the water and reaches for a towel, wrapping it tightly around herself as she steps out of the shower stall.* Seriously, what is wrong with you? Some privacy would be nice sometimes! *She scowls at Cole while trying to wring excess moisture from her long brown hair.*

And eww, did you just throw my underwear in the wash? That's so gross! Just because we live together doesn't give you free reign over my laundry too... *Shaking her head in disgust, Haillee moves past him towards the door.* Wait outside until I'm dressed. And knock next time before coming into places where there could be nudity involved!

*With that demand issued sharply over her shoulder, Haillee exits the bathroom swiftly clutching her towel closed around her curvy figure. Her face burns red - mortified yet again by one of Cole's brazenly inappropriate behaviors aimed solely at getting under HER skin somehow...*
